00036 namespace Hypertable {

00038   class Reactor : public ReferenceCount {
00039 
00040     friend class ReactorFactory;
00041 
00042   public:
00043 
00044     static const int READ_READY;
00045     static const int WRITE_READY;
00046 
00047     Reactor();
00048     ~Reactor() {
00049       poll_loop_interrupt();
00050     }
00051 
00052     void operator()();
00053 
00054     void add_request(uint32_t id, IOHandler *handler, DispatchHandler *dh, boost::xtime &expire) {
00055       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00056       boost::xtime now;
00057       m_request_cache.insert(id, handler, dh, expire);
00058       boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00059       if (m_next_wakeup.sec == 0 || xtime_cmp(expire, m_next_wakeup) < 0)
00060         poll_loop_interrupt();
00061     }
00062 
00063     DispatchHandler *remove_request(uint32_t id) {
00064       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00065       return m_request_cache.remove(id);
00066     }
00067 
00068     void cancel_requests(IOHandler *handler) {
00069       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00070       m_request_cache.purge_requests(handler);
00071     }
00072 
00073     void add_timer(ExpireTimer &timer) {
00074       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00075       m_timer_heap.push(timer);
00076       poll_loop_interrupt();
00077     }
00078 
00079     void schedule_removal(IOHandler *handler) {
00080       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00081       m_removed_handlers.insert(handler);
00082     }
00083 
00084     void get_removed_handlers(std::set<IOHandler *> &dst) {
00085       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00086       dst = m_removed_handlers;
00087       m_removed_handlers.clear();
00088     }
00089 
00090     void handle_timeouts(PollTimeout &next_timeout);
00091 
00092 #if defined(__linux__)
00093     int poll_fd;
00094 #elif defined (__APPLE__)
00095     int kqd;
00096 #endif
00097 
00098     void poll_loop_interrupt();
00099     void poll_loop_continue();
00100 
00101   protected:
00102     boost::mutex    m_mutex;
00103     RequestCache    m_request_cache;
00104     std::priority_queue<ExpireTimer, std::vector<ExpireTimer>, LtTimer> m_timer_heap;
00105     int             m_interrupt_sd;
00106     bool            m_interrupt_in_progress;
00107     boost::xtime    m_next_wakeup;
00108     std::set<IOHandler *> m_removed_handlers;
00109   };
00110   typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<Reactor> ReactorPtr;
